metadata.name: WHITEWATER
metadata.description:
If you fall in, keep your feet up.

Created with Javascript + p5js by Andrew Mitchell in July, 2022

This is an on-chain generative 1/1 artwork. The piece is future-proof, and can always be pulled from the contract. Simply call GetScriptChunk(0x1fa23513825f952afca07a603ac3f312ebee4ca9, 1, 0) on this token's extension contract (https://etherscan.io/address/0x534514948a28bc76b8f2f2f6b6c1745329375710) to return the html for the piece.

 Read more about what it means to be On-Chain here https://medium.com/@mitchel1/the-rise-of-on-chain-1-1-generative-art-on-eth-7f663aa52736

Controls: 

Press A to save 1000x1000 png

Press S to save 2000x2000 png

Press D to save 1000x1000 png with grain

Press F to save 2000x2000 png with grain

Click to Pause

Tap up arrow to increase framerate

Tap down arrow to decrease framerate

Each time the piece is rendered, the location and order of the colors will change. The colors themselves will never change.
